sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHEIMS, a city of France in Champagne, and capital of Rhemois. It is one of the moſt ancient, celebrated, and largeſt places in the kingdom, had an archbiſhop’s ſee, whoſe archbiſhop was duke and peer of. France. It is about four miles in circumference, and contains ſeveral ſine fquares, well-built houſes, and magnificent churches. It had a mint, an univerſity, and ſive abbeys, the moſt famous of which was that of St Remy. There are alſo ſeveral triumphal arches and other monuments of the Romans. It is feated on the river Velie, on a plain ſurrounded by hills, which produce excellent wine. E. Long. 4. 8. N. Lat. 49. 14.
